id.help:
The ID of the Nostr event to display (required)
Example: note1..., nevent1...

user.help:
The user's ID or nip05 address to display (required)
Example: note1..., nevent1..., or xx@xx.xx

naddr.help:
Specify the Nostr address in naddr format to display
Example: naddr1...

kind.help:
The kind of the event to display (required)
Example: 30001, 30003, etc.

relays.help: List of relay URLs used for fetching (optional)

href.help:
The URL of the event link.
If omitted, it will be generated automatically

target.help:
Specifies the target attribute of the link
Example: "_blank"

theme.help:
Specifies the display theme:
- auto (default): Follows system settings
- dark: Display in dark mode
- light: Display in light mode

display.help:
Select display style:
- card (default): With line breaks for readability
- compact: Single-line compact style

sortOrder.help:
Select the order of events:
- normal (default): Standard order
- reverse: Reverse order

itemsPerPage.help: Number of items to display per page (optional)
